lead_paragraph: Britax Child Safety said it is recalling 71,000 infant car seats in the United States, citing one report of the handle breaking and a baby being injured.
snippet: Britax Child Safety said it is recalling 71,000 infant car seats in the United States, citing one report of the handle breaking and a baby being injured.

headline.main: Britax Car Seats Recalled After Handle Breaks
headline.print_headline: Car Seats for Infants Are Recalled

abstract: Britax Child Safety is recalling about 71,000 child car seats in United States due to faulty carrying handle; say product can break, allowing carrier to be dropped.
